website_summaries.verdict: Achieve an upholstery makeover, repair cracks, and much more.
pros: We love that this cleaner removes dirt and also softens several types of boat interiors in addition to other water crafts as well, helping preserve our prized vessels for the long run
Used by professionals as well as devoted customers who've counted on this cleaner for over a decade
cons: We wish the product came with better packaging

customer_reviews.title: removes aged on grime
customer_reviews.text: So, I got this stuff to try to clean up what I thought were already fairly clean seats on the boat I just purchased. Turns out they were not clean at all, and this stuff cleans them up really great! In the picture here, the right side is where I started wiping this stuff on and grime just came right off. It's obvious now that these seats were so dingy that they just looked a different color and I didn't realize what the original color was until I applied some Vinyl Sauce. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Val S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, paired with Hot Sauce.
customer_reviews.text: Great product line for boat detailing. This is a detail quick wax that is a great follow up to routine use of their Hot Sauce, after use wipe down/water spot remover. In my case, the Hot Sauce does such a great job, I rarely have to use this wax. Although, I'm putting a coat on today before I go out. My recommendation is to do a good detail wax and sealant on your boat. Wipe it down after every use, preferably with Hot Sauce. Every few times or maybe weekly/every other week (depending on how often you use your boat), do a quickie wax. Will look like a fresh detail...
customer_reviews.author: CJ In Texas

customer_reviews.title: SO much better than 303...
customer_reviews.text: If you own a boat, you've been told your entire "boating life" that you need to use 303 Protectant. Well... yeah, you do need to use SOMETHING. But - 303 is greasy and slick and I hate the way it feels when you apply it. Condition Sauce? Ahhh... finally. It smells good, protects GREAT, and it doesn't leave this greasy "armorall" feel all over your vinyl. If you're on the fence about it - don't be. Order this, use it, and then shelf your grandfathers 303.
customer_reviews.author: Todd W.

customer_reviews.title: Bugs love this conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the Condition Sauce. Smells nice and seats look great. However, some type of biting gnats like this conditioner also. I did the seats around 5 pm and noticed I was getting attacked. That night at 9 pm my seats and boat was swarming in gnats. I could literally rake the gnats off the seats into piles. It's been 4 days and everyday I have to clean the gnats off the seats. I have never had this problem with the conditioner I used in the past. Sadly I'll have to return to previous product. I can't deal with being attacked and covered in bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Billie K. Brackins

customer_reviews.title: Great product, pair with their vinyl cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Boat bling sauces are my go to's for my boat. Use their vinyl cleaner as necessary and this conditioner whenever it seems like a good idea. At beginning of season (or better probably when you lay it up for the winter, put it on kind of heavy), and maybe again about mid summer-all depends on use and exposure in the Texas sun, of course.
customer_reviews.author: CJ In Texas

customer_reviews.title: Best boat detailer period
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different products but this stuff is the best. After taking the skis out of the water I wipe them down to remove the standing water and then spray this on and wipe them off again. It takes off all of the water spots, leaves a smooth waxed surface, and best of all it smells GREAT. Even works on the hard water on the Colorado River. I can't think of any way to make it better. Keeps my Yamaha SuperJets looking new.
customer_reviews.author: Desmo

customer_reviews.title: Boat Bling my go to!
customer_reviews.text: OK Boat Bling guys, this stuff is FANTASTIC... I had never seen it till I got some on closeout at Cabellas.... only product I use up to last drop. Has a great coconut smell. I use it more on the car than on the boat.. it lasts fairly well but doesn't take rain well... it washes off somewhat - but then so does other brands. Boat bling is great for your car too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: NLess Tech

customer_reviews.title: it really works
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my glass shower doors that were never cleaned before I moved in to my house. I couldn't see thru them at all. now I can see thru it. its so clean and also used on my kids car. the side was getting wet from sprinklers and made water spots. sprayed on and let sit a few minutes and wiped off. like new now. we do have a boat that we will be using it on as well. great product!
customer_reviews.author: Pati8675

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love love. We have 2 pwc and a friend with a boat. He’s who got us hooked on this stuff. Even if our things are still in the water, a quick rub down with this and it’s looks as if it’s been derailed and it’s sitting on my trailer. The best stuff. Used my vinyl on my car also and it smells like coconut and gave a beautiful shine to the inside of my car. The hot sauce smells like vinegar but we actually enjoy the smell. Great products from these guys. I’m ready to buy the whole arsenal
customer_reviews.author: Brittany stedman

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend Hot Sauce!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and smells good too. All my boater friends and family members are hooked on this stuff to care for their boats after experiencing how well it works to clean my boat. I spray and wipe my boat down after each use and it looks great and the gelcoat has a smooth slick feeling, like it has been freshly waxed. I only wax the boat once per year since being introduced to this great product. I've also used it on my vehicles and in my house on the shower doors. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I always like to wash my vehicles myself. Being that I have well water, that was impossible to do. I found this product and put it to the test. I washed my car in the Hot sun just to see. I followed directions, and applied to the car while drying. I could not believe the results. No water marks, very impressive. It may require a little elbow grease, but the results well worth it. I would suggest using a quick detailer after, but it's not required. Also I don't suggest washing the vehicle in the sun, but sometimes you don't have a choice. This is just the product for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Walton-Chiusa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The conditioner is extremely oily and sucks. It didn't soak into or soften the leather it just makes an oily mess. And it's way overpriced and stinks. I will never buy it again. The cleaner works decent for material that isn't too terribly dirty but again it is way overpriced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ec3

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned up all the hard water spots
customer_reviews.text: I had ugly hard water spots on the lower trim of my travel trailer. A detailer had showed me how well this stuff works and he didn't lie. Cleaned up all the water spots easily. I purchased an industrial spray bottle to get the product on to the surface and then used a clean washcloth to clean it up. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Same as soap and water
customer_reviews.text: Might as well just used soap and water. I put this on one cushion and soap and water on the one right beside of it. There is absolutely no difference in how they look after comparing the 2. No stains were even remotely removed. Nice bottle though...they did that part right at least.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Tried a lot of other products and nothing works better. Who wants to spend extra time sweating it ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried a lot of other products and nothing works better. Who wants to spend extra time sweating it out on the asphalt parking lot wiping off water spots any longer than they have to. Other great thing is that this stuff goes a long way. 1 squirt bottle will last me 4 trips wiping down my 22' deckboat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware before you use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my boat. The boat was on the trailer in the drive way. After spraying this on and waxing the entire boat I noticed that the white wax mist from the spray stuck on everything including the trailer and driveway. Millions of white specks everywhere. I was able to get most off of my galvanized trailer but the driveway would not come clean even with power washing and scrubbing. The job it did was not worth the price. The mess it made cost me a lot of time and I'm stuck with it. Absoulutely NOT recommended if you cherish anything around what you intend to wax...
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Great vinyl/leather conditioner
customer_reviews.text: We love boat bling! I bought this conditioner for my boat seats, but we love it so much that we ended up using it for our truck and heavy equipment interiors as well. Smells great and leaves a nice shiny finish. I also highly recommend boat bling hot sauce for the outside of your boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I hate writing bad reviews, but this stuff sucked. I used this on my dad's pontoon boat seats, as they were very dirty and needed to be cleaned. His seats were Vinyl. And it did Almost nothing after multiple applications. An all natural cleanerfor the house I bought from Amazon did a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rupple

customer_reviews.title: Okay result's.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Dad to clean his pontoon seats. He said it did a pretty good job but didn't get all the stains off the seats (the boat is one year old and has only been used one summer so far)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie W

customer_reviews.title: 100% better try it
customer_reviews.text: after years of using a mixture of water and vinegar, when I take the boat out of the lake to clean up lake scum. I tried this stuff and wow it works great boat looks so much better after a wipe down from being on the lake a 100% better. will use this from now on
customer_reviews.author: love to shop for the wife

customer_reviews.title: Best conditioner I’ve used for our boat vinyl
customer_reviews.text: This product works great on the seats of our boat. It leaves a nice texture without feeling greasy. It also has a great smell. A little goes a long way and it’s quick and easy to apply with a dry microfiber towel.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Listen, it does not smell great, and it costs some money, but this stuff definitely gets the job done! I user it on gloss-coated carbon fiber rowing shells and it pulls off the water spots quite effectively. We wax after the spots are gone, making the spots quite a bit easier to remove the next time around. It gets the job done for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This has made the process of wiping off our boat after we take it out of the water sooo much easier. Yes it does have an odor of vinegar but not horrible. I keep our spray bottle filled up and use it every time our boat comes out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boat cleaner I've ever used by far.
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best stuff I have EVER used to clean my boat I have ever used. I has no beach and yet it easily removes mildew, mold, water stains and spider poop. I'm Very happy that a friend recommended it to me. It really cuts the boat cleaning time by a lot. I'm a VERY happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: It’s so awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Our boat always goes through the roughest time because we have many people on our boat constantly. I used this stuff with a magic eraser and let me tell you it was the easiest thing I’ve ever used to clean my boat. Picture for reference- left is before, right is after. And it smells really good too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my black boat. Keeps it nice and shined up. We buy by the gallon and fill up two old spray bottles I have. Right after we pull the boat from the water, we spray and wipe down with hot sauce. I usually wax twice a season and use hot sauce the rest of the time. My boat always is looking great
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: It does not remove hard water as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: As a mobile detailer I am always looking for products that actually work, this does not seem to be one. I tried it multiple times, on different vehicles, in varies temps, it does not work on water spots as advertised. It may work on new water spots, but it is not aggressive enough to remove water spots that have been left on paint and glass for extended period. I will stick with Erasure or 0000 steel wool, they at least work. I had high hopes for this product....
customer_reviews.author: ryoko neill

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: That’s nice product to use when we aren’t going to wash the entire trailer and just need to do a spot clean. Works great on tree sap from the Willow over my trailer that drops sap
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Great on vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Works great on vinyl in my boat gets out the sunscreen and other dirty marks left on the vinyl during normal use. Has good scent as well. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive gimmick
customer_reviews.text: This is not as good as 409 and costs much more. It did nothing that either 409 or any other liquid cleaner does on my boat's seats. Sorry I spent the extra cash
customer_reviews.author: britain22

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Had my boat in the water for about a week. I pulled it out and it sat for a good hour while I cleaned the inside of the boat. When I got to cleaning the outside of the boat the hard water spots were dried on. I sprayed the hot sauce on with a spray bottle and the hard spots wiped off with very little effort. It smells good too!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sauce!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Like many folks, my boat has white vinyl seating and it always gets dirty and smudged with stuff. This is by far the best cleaner I've used to get it back to white again. I just wish it were easier to get.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive, but worth the price. Needed something to protect vinyl from weather and make it shine. Works very well on my street rod upholstery and hot tub cover.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Weishaar

customer_reviews.title: ATE THROUGH THE PLASTIC BOTTLE and is EMPTY NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased HOT Sauce because it works so well on getting the water spots off my boat, but the Hot Sauce ate right through the thick plastic bottle and now it is empty! $37.00 down the drain literally! Is there anyway I could get another bottle sent to me? Maybe my luck will be better with a solid container? Pretty Please! Your product is great, just would like to be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Dianechacon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work so great
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work! The boat interior is still dirty after trying three times. Not sure how this stuff get good reviews. Adds a little shine and does a small amount of cleaning and that’s it. First pic is before second is after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like how it makes the fabric soft and pliable Thus product was recommended and a little less expensive then others
customer_reviews.author: D. J.

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for boat owners
customer_reviews.text: This vinyl cleaner worked miracles on my boat seats that were stained with clay from the river. Look at the side by side comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good product would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Kind of expensive, but it works and is a lot cheaper than having to wax your boat. It really keeps the water spots from forming and let’s your boat shin ... we like it ...
customer_reviews.author: doodlebug

customer_reviews.title: Works great smells weird
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!!! Works great to keep the water spots off the boats. Already went through our 1st gallon this summer & working on our 2nd. Smell weird like bubblegum & vinegar but gets the job done. We keep a spray bottle of this & a microfiber cloth on both our boats at all times for quick wipe downs.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: I still like to use 303 with the sunblock once a month ...
customer_reviews.text: I've started using this sauce this season for my 2016 malibu vlx interior and seems to work really well. I use it every time we use the boat when wiping the boat down. I still like to use 303 with the sunblock once a month to help prevent fading but the vinyl sauce really helps me keep my malibu clean
customer_reviews.author: Justin K

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I had better results with Windex sad.
customer_reviews.text: Are use this product on vinyl and it did not help at all, will maybe a little bit. But I felt like I had better results with Windex sad.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: No spots
customer_reviews.text: Best wipe down product out there. This works great for getting water spots off. Not a wax though.
customer_reviews.author: mark r mataya

customer_reviews.title: Great on everything
customer_reviews.text: If you own a boat you need to buy hot sauce my buddy has a lake boat and told me how great this stuff was I’m glad I bought it it works on my ocean boat taking off the salt and water spots he uses it for the water spots on his freshwater ski boat I use it for salt and water spots on an ocean boat works the best on isinglass and doesn’t scratch or stain
customer_reviews.author: Mark ONeil

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - Arrived leaking with the box wet
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for quite a while with much success. I ordered a 2 large containers for interior and exterior. One of them arrived leaking with the box wet from the contents. I started a return but UPS won't take it because it is liquid and not sealed. No one is at Amazon to help me with this during the crisis...so I will wait for a resolution. Great product highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best stuff on the market works great on everything from boats, campers , and cars any painted surface but fair warming it does not smell good at all but it works so well you can’t put it down.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We are in love with this product line. We always use it to detail our boat at the end of the season and I forget how great it looks when we're done. At the start of the season, people always ask if we have a new boat. :)
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Ramsbacher

customer_reviews.title: Never leave to the lake without it!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this cleaner for a couple years and it’s great!! Removes water spots and leaves my boat looking brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Carisa

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle that came had a broken seal and a good amount had leaked out. They replaced it no problems. Works great on the boat, my hard water lake makes my black boat pretty spotted when it comes out, this works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use this product, you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my leather truck seats and waverunner. Cleaned the seats like new and took the yellowing out of the waverunner seat.
customer_reviews.author: Richard MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the way it works
customer_reviews.text: Working well on my vinyl pontoon seats. Leaves a non-oily but moist feel. Spray on and wipe to remove marks, mildew and dirt. Very happy with the way it works.
customer_reviews.author: dogafterdarkdog

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff - It's way better than 303.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an great product to clean your boat this is the only stuff to buy! I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. Best conditioner we have used. Love all their products except for the wax.
customer_reviews.author: cjones1840

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like magic...spray on and wipe off with very little elbow grease. Used it for the first time to today with water spots that were about a month old and boat is shining like it’s just been detailed. Took me about 20 mins to do a 26 foot tritoon...will be buying again and again
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a green residue
customer_reviews.text: This product is leaving a light green residue on the seats. If you want to keep your cushions white do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Artem R

customer_reviews.title: Spots B gone!
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff on glass boat. Removes water spots and has a good shine. Kinda expensive for what it does but at least it works like advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tom V.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but broken sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: The Vinyl Sauce worked great on our 1990 baja with very old and discolored vinyl. I'm knocking off a star because unfortunately the sprayer part of the bottle was broken and not able to be used. So I had to buy a cheap bottle at a dollar store and transfer the liquid over before it could even be used. Even with the broken sprayer, I will definitely buy more once we are running low.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: A must have for those of us that boat in scummy lakes/rivers
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Smells like a bubble gum vinegar mix. I use it everytime my boat comes out of the water. It wipes off quick and keeps the shine on my hull and no water spots left behind.
customer_reviews.author: D in MN

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gelcoat cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Got the spray bottle and now I just get this to refill it. It seems like our hull looks better after every use than it did before we dropped it in the water. I feel like it's taking off years of lake water, and we use it every time we use the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my boat seats. Cleans quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, watch for leaks during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great product ....had to refuse delivery once due to product leaked out . Box was completely soaked...second time arrived ,it had leaked again, lost about 1/4 of product, gave up and kept it...works awesome on vinyl upholstery not greasy, makes it look new again,
customer_reviews.author: mike mcelwee

customer_reviews.title: If you have a boat especially a newer one spend the extra money you will be pleased with the results
customer_reviews.text: I tried all the vinyl cleaners for our 2000 Malibu Wakesetter mothers, starbrite etc. and none even come close to the bot bling vinyl sauce. If you have a boat especially a newer one spend the extra money you will be pleased with the results! This stuff will amaze you just spray and wipe and thats it!
customer_reviews.author: John Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner, remove hard water marks
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner. Works great on paint and windows. Removes all hard water marks and leaves shiny!
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hard water  remover.
customer_reviews.text: Very good at removing hard water on midsection of outboards. Removes Hard water spots with ease.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Get the vinyl sauce for interior but don’t waste money on the hot sauce!
customer_reviews.text: Vinyl sauce is great!! Keeps seats soft Hot sauce on the other hand is awful. Leaves watermarks even when using microfiber cloths. Doesn’t seal at ALL
customer_reviews.author: Tauna r.

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works great at removing water spots, smells like vinegar, does the job👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: Hot Sauce
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love the Hot Sauce products. We use all of their products
customer_reviews.author: BART

customer_reviews.title: Good smell, not work as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love the coconut smell, but still it do not remove sunscreens mark
customer_reviews.author: Orange

customer_reviews.title: Good product for $$
customer_reviews.text: Very fast application and removal. Leaves nice shine and slick feel. Can use on glass to make them pop. Only dislike is if spray directly on surface the overspray leaves white dots everywhere but easily wiped off. Better to apply w applicator imo
customer_reviews.author: Fares Holdings

customer_reviews.title: just use vinegar
customer_reviews.text: Just use water and vinegar its the same thing..but over all it works well
customer_reviews.author: troy

customer_reviews.title: YOU'LL BE NOTHING BUT SHINE WHEN YOU BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I use it on the black gel coat of my boat and the water spots melt off. It is a must have for anyone wanting to make their boat look great and protect it too. Try the Vinyl Sauce for your interior...works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: BJL

customer_reviews.title: New go to for quick detailing
customer_reviews.text: Boat bling is great stuff use on my boat and waverunner and it is the only stuff I use the whole bottle. I use it more on our cars than the boats. Has a great coconut smell and works extremely well. I recommend you try it.
customer_reviews.author: NLess Tech

customer_reviews.title: Where is the product?
customer_reviews.text: Hot Sauce came highly recommended. I ordered the Hot Sauce and was anxious to receive, but when I did, the gallon jug was completely empty! The cap was broken off, seal was not intact but the box was perfectly fine. There was no stain on the box from any product so I wonder just where was the product??
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Water spots disappear!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my boat! I suggest wearing rubber gloves as the strong vinegar smell is hard to get off your hands. Still worth it because it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Helm

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Our boat looks amazing! Seriously, the product works really great. Took 2 months of water spots off our boat and it now shines better then the day we brought it home from the dealership. Cleaned the windows really nice too. My son says, “Looks and smells like blue airheads.” lol! Would definitely recommend this to other boat owners.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: If you own a boat, you have to have this product. Works and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it helps clean because it's wet but i didn't get the wow i expected
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Advertised Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is not the best wax out on the market but highly recommended if in a hurry. It does do exactly as advertised. It is great when you want to get the shiny wax look but want to do it quickly. I waxed my 21 foot jet boat in 45 minutes with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Chatsworth

customer_reviews.title: I hate water spots
customer_reviews.text: I hate water spots!!!! With a black boat (2012 Malibu Wakesetter MXZ) mostly used in Arizona water spots are a constant problem! I've used other products in the past and nothing beats Hot Sauce. Bought this product several times and will keep buying it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Old Boat Seats Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this Vinyl Sauce. It did a great job on cleaning some older white boats seats that I have. Made them really look great and the Condition Sauce made all the difference in the world. I high recommend all the Boat Bling products.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Burris

customer_reviews.title: Great multi use conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This condition sauce is the best for leather and anything else in the interior of your car! Easy on and off with great conditioning and not greasy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for removing hard water spots
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my boats and waverunner with great results. This will remove hard water spots and not strip wax. It removed water spots from gel coat on my waverunner that had been there for a year. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cool

customer_reviews.title: Great awesome Sauce!
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff that you can use on your boat or any vehicle. It works especially well on removing lake water spots and keeping the boat paint more repellent in the future. We also use Vinyl Sauce to protect our interior.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Drummond

customer_reviews.title: New boat owner-great cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: We have cream vinyl interior in our new(old-2003) boat. This product works wonders when we pull off the lake after a day of fun and clean up the seats. Highly recommend and will be buying this product, the conditioner and exterior spot cleaner again!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth N.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap spay nozzle through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Cheap fks took the good nozzle and gave me this pos I hate Amazon. Will be buying this local at a boat shop for an extra dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Knowlton

customer_reviews.title: Great product if i could use it
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but i can’t use it due to the fact they shipped it without the spray nozzle. The vinyl sauce came with a spray nozzle but not the condition sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Cali-girl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing spot remover for boats.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. We've got a red boat and it's always very spotty from the lake. Wiping it with just water doesn't do the trick but this tuff eliminates the spots and makes it look new again!
customer_reviews.author: harisn9000

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Had black spots on my boat vinyl. I was told by a friend that this product works and it will take it out. For 50$ I thought and expected it to do the job, but it did not. Very disappointing....could have got the same result with Windex...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product I’ve used for spots
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and literally make water spots disappear!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Goes on fast, a quart would do a 30 boat easily.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: HOT SAUCE is the BOMB!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use - works with dry or wet boat. I have used a lot of these products in the past and this one doesn't disappoint..
customer_reviews.author: Brad Allen Young

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: We go over our boat right after we bring it in from the water. We love this stuff. Good smell and takes the water spots off well.
customer_reviews.author: sagebrushwy

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product on our boat seats and it did not work. It did not remove any stains. Horrible-do not waste your money on this product. I would like to see some proof from other individuals that rated this a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: troy payne

customer_reviews.title: Best Cleaner for my boat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My boat looks amazing after using this!
customer_reviews.author: tracy stewart

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product works great with light scrubbing and wiping clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product works great with light scrubbing and wiping clean thoroughly I cannot express how pleased I am with this products performance
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Didn't clean as well as i expected after using their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  Mind blown!
customer_reviews.text: YES YES YES! If you are considering buying this product, just say yes! I am a professional detailer and I haven't come across a product that works this well for boats yet. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: IdahoFolks

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome. Cleans my boat and jet skis to like ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Cleans my boat and jet skis to like new showroom condition. Took off the hard water spots with ease. Very good product
customer_reviews.author: Tristen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Read description
customer_reviews.text: But bling is nice but Amazon sucks didn't package it good it broke everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaning product ever
customer_reviews.text: Best cleaning product ever .I used on my boat but then tried on my cars .Wow This stuff is great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nashvilletwin

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: This liquid boat cleaner bottle was laid down in the box, and then leaked in the box, soaking it. The bottle cap should have been tighter, plus the bottle should have been upright in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
